errorMessage: {{Select1.selectedOptionValue=='pan' && Input2.isValid==false?"Length/Format of Individual PAN is Invalid. If entered in lower character please erase and enter in upper character":""}}
label: Document Number
validation: {{(Select1.selectedOptionValue=='pan' && (get_org_constitution.data[0].constitution=='85 - Private Limited Company' || get_org_constitution.data[0].constitution=='86 - Public Limited Company'))?((Input2.text.length==10)&&(/[A-Z]{3}[C]{1}[A-Z]{1}[0-9]{4}[A-Z]{1}$/.test(Input2.text))):(Select1.selectedOptionValue=='pan' && (get_org_constitution.data[0].constitution=='53 - PARTNERSHIP FIRMS' || get_org_constitution.data[0].constitution=='89 - Limited Liability Partnership'))?((Input2.text.length==10)&&(/[A-Z]{3}[F]{1}[A-Z]{1}[0-9]{4}[A-Z]{1}$/.test(Input2.text))):(Select1.selectedOptionValue=='pan' && get_org_constitution.data[0].constitution=='84 - Sole Proprietorship')?((Input2.text.length==10)&&(/[A-Z]{3}[P]{1}[A-Z]{1}[0-9]{4}[A-Z]{1}$/.test(Input2.text))):""}}
